title: G Gradual Men's Fleece Joggers with Zipper Pockets Winter Warm Pants Water Resistant Athletic Workout Gym Sweatpants for Men
description: Soft Fleece Lined: Made with extremely soft fleece lining interior, which makes you feel warm and comfortable on the skin. Ideal for cold weather under 30°F.
Water Resistant & Stretchy: Durable water-resistant coating keeps you warm and dry. 4-way stretch material will move with your body to increase the range of motion.
2 Zipper Pockets: Features with 2 side zipper pockets, which are deep enough to hold your phone, wallet or keys that won't easily fall out when you bend over or exercise.
Perfect Style: Elastic waistband and adjustable drawstring offer different people's custom fit. The tapered leg design with enough length makes you look slim and athletic.
Multi-Occasions: G Gradual mens jogger sweatpants are perfect for all kinds of activities, like workout, athletic, soccer, running, traning, cycling or daily wearing in winter.
